title: 04/18: NFL Draft Preview with Ryan Wilson (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
It's our big NFL Draft preview show as Ryan Wilson joins us to talk about the top QBs, RBs, WRs and TEs. Which underrated prospects could surprise people in 2019 (4:00)? What is ARI going to do with the #1 pick (7:32)? And we get into the top QBs in the 2019 Draft (10:50). Is Kyler Murray a potential Fantasy star? ... RB talk (18:30) which obviously begins with Josh Jacobs, but who else do you need to know about? And we do have some NFL news to cover (30:00) including DeMaryius Thomas' signing, Russell Wilson's new contact, Todd Gurley's comments on his knee and more ... Talking WR (38:30) as D.K. Metcalf is just one of the names to know this year. And we finish with TEs (51:00). Noah Fant and T.J. Hockenson are both vying to be the first TE drafted, so who is better for Fantasy purposes? ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Get ready for the NFL Draft as Ryan Wilson helps us preview the players that Fantasy owners should know about.
